formElement.label: Kubernetes YAML file
formElement.documentation: Kubernetes YAML file contents containing related services and deployments definitions.

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project in which the application or the microservices will be created.

formElement.label: Create application-scoped microservices:
formElement.documentation: Whether all the services defined in the Kubernetes YAML file should be created within one application in ElectricFlow. If checked, then the application name must be provided.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application to create, within which the microservices will be created. Required if 'Create application-scoped microservices' is checked.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project that the environment belongs to.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the ElectricFlow environment containing the Kubernetes-based cluster where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the ElectricFlow cluster representing a Kubernetes cluster where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.
